text: Michael Lewis Joyce (born February 12, 1941) is a former relief pitcher in Major League Baseball who played for the Chicago White Sox during the and seasons. Listed at , , Joyce batted and threw right-handed. A native of Detroit, Michigan, he attended University of Michigan. In a two-season career, Joyce posted a 2–1 record with a 4.33 ERA in 31 appearances, including one start, giving up 26 runs on 53 hits and 22 walks while striking out 16 in 54.0 innings of work.
